mapper.insert: insert into gateway_service_info(load_type, service_name, service_desc, create_at, update_at, is_delete) VALUES (#{info.loadType}, #{info.serviceName}, #{info.serviceDesc}, #{info.createAt}, #{info.updateAt}, #{info.deleted})
mapper.select:
select * from gateway_service_info
is_delete != 1
and service_name like concat('%',#{query},'%')
limit #{page},#{size};
select * from gateway_service_info where is_delete != 1 and id = #{id};
select * from gateway_service_info where is_delete != 1 and service_name = #{serviceName};
